title: Yining Liu (Elaine)
text:
BIOGRAPHY
I am a PhD Student in the Systems Biology and Bioinformatics program at Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine. My research focuses on unveiling the genetic complexity of Alzheimerâ€™s Disease, specifically in the Amish population. My training involves molecular and cell biology, bioinformatics, and biostatistics. Outside of lab work, I enjoy hiking, traveling, and baking.


EDUCATION
PhD in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, 2022 - present Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine
ScM in Molecular Microbiology and Immunology, 2020 - 2022 Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
BS in Biochemistry and Neurobiology (Honors), 2016 - 2020 University of Wisconsin-Madison
